parameters.name: CmsArgs
parameters.description: The cloud services that you want to monitor. The CmsArgs parameter is the startup parameter of the cms-exporter collector. Separate multiple cloud services with number signs (`#`).

parameters.name: DirectArgs
parameters.description: The recently monitored cloud services. Separate multiple cloud services with number signs (`#`).

parameters.name: EnableTag
parameters.description: Specifies whether to collect the aliyun tags attached to each cloud service. Default value: false.
